body_html: @ezyang I'm adding parallelization so that we can match the TH timings for the multicore case as well. After that I'd like to merge this. The idea is that this serves as a foundation for future work such as vectorization etc., but should not introduce any perf regression in comparison to current code.

body: @ezyang I'm adding parallelization so that we can match the TH timings for the multicore case as well. After that I'd like to merge this. The idea is that this serves as a foundation for future work such as vectorization etc., but should not introduce any perf regression in comparison to current code.
